components/category/sidebar:
{{#if category.subcategories}}
{{category.name}}
    {{#each category.subcategories}}
  • {{name}}
    • {{/each}}
{{/if}} {{#if category.faceted_search_enabled}}
{{> components/faceted-search/index category}}
{{else}} {{> components/category/shop-by-price shop_by_price=category.shop_by_price category_url=category.url}} {{/if}}
layout/base:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html class="no-js" lang="{{ locale_name }}">
    <head>
        <title>{{ head.title }}</title>
        {{#if page_type '===' '404'}}
            <meta name="robots" content="noindex,follow">
        {{/if}}
        {{{ resourceHints }}}
        {{{ head.meta_tags }}}
        {{{ head.config }}}
        {{#block "head"}} {{/block}}

        <link href="{{ head.favicon }}" rel="shortcut icon">
        <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Lato" rel="stylesheet">
        <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Montserrat" rel="stylesheet">
        <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Poppins" rel="stylesheet">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://use.fontawesome.com/releases/v5.3.1/css/all.css" integrity="sha384-mzrmE5qonljUremFsqc01SB46JvROS7bZs3IO2EmfFsd15uHvIt+Y8vEf7N7fWAU" crossorigin="anonymous">
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1">

        <script src="https://cdn.polyfill.io/v2/polyfill.min.js"></script>

        <script>
            // Change document class from no-js to js so we can detect this in css
            document.documentElement.className = document.documentElement.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        </script>

        {{ getFontsCollection }}
        
        {{{stylesheet '/assets/css/theme.css'}}}

        {{{head.scripts}}}
        {{{head.rsslinks}}}


        {{inject 'themeSettings' theme_settings}}
        {{inject 'genericError' (lang 'common.generic_error')}}
        {{inject 'maintenanceMode' settings.maintenance}}
        {{inject 'urls' urls}}
        {{{snippet 'htmlhead'}}}

        <!-- Google Tag Manager -->
        <script>(function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':
        new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
        j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=
        'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
        })(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-M8GPWXL');</script>
        <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
        
        {{#if in_development}}
            {{inject 'inDevelopment' true}}
        {{/if}}
    </head>
    <body class="page--{{page_type}} {{> components/custom/body-classes }}">
        <!-- Google Tag Manager (noscript) -->
        <noscript><iframe src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-M8GPWXL"
        height="0" width="0" style="display:none;visibility:hidden"></iframe></noscript>
        <!-- End Google Tag Manager (noscript) -->
        {{{snippet 'header'}}}

        {{#if settings.privacy_cookie}}
            {{> components/common/cookie}}
        {{/if}}

        {{> components/common/header }} 
        {{> components/common/body }}
        {{> components/common/footer }}

        <script>window.__webpack_public_path__ = "{{cdn 'assets/dist/'}}";</script>
        <script src="{{cdn 'assets/dist/theme-bundle.main.js'}}"></script>

        <script>
            // Exported in app.js
            window.stencilBootstrap("{{page_type}}", {{jsContext}}).load();
        </script>

        {{{footer.scripts}}}
        {{{snippet 'footer'}}}

    

        <svg data-src="{{cdn 'img/icon-sprite.svg'}}" class="icons-svg-sprite"></svg>
        {{> components/custom/its-schema }}
    </body>
</html>

{{> components/category/sort-box sort=sort}} {{> components/category/sidebar}}

components/custom/its-schema:
<script type="application/ld+json">
    {
        "@context": "http://schema.org",
        "@type": "LocalBusiness",
        "address": {
            "@type": "PostalAddress",
            "addressLocality": "",
            "addressRegion": "",
            "postalCode": "",
            "streetAddress": ""
        },
        "description": "",
        "name": "{{settings.store_name}}",
        "url":"{{urls.home}}",
        "telephone": "{{settings.phone_number}}",
        "image": "{{getImage settings.store_logo.image 'logo_size'}}"
    }
    </script>
    <script type="application/ld+json">
    {
        "@context": "http://schema.org",
        "@type": "WebSite",
        "url": "{{urls.home}}",
        "potentialAction": {
            "@type": "SearchAction",
            "target": "{{urls.home}}search.php?search_query={search_term_string}",
            "query-input": "required name=search_term_string"
        }
    }
    </script>
    <script type="application/ld+json">
    {
        "@context": "http://schema.org",
        "@type": "Organization",
        "url": "{{urls.home}}",
        "logo": "{{getImage settings.store_logo.image 'logo_size'}}"
    }
</script>
